languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь дотронуться до камня в шее Кассии, однако неизвестная сила не позволяет вам даже коснуться его — пальцы застывают в миллиметре от кожи, словно невидимая броня покрывает теперь шею девушки. Камень начинает быстро нагреваться, обжигая нежную кожу девушки.{/n} "Хватит... Хватит, прошу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь дотронуться до камня в шее Кассии, однако неизвестная сила не позволяет вам даже коснуться его — пальцы застывают в милиметре от кожи, словно невидимая броня ппокрывает теперь шею девушки. Камень начинает быстро нагреваться, обжигая нежную кожу девушки.{/n} "Хватит... Хватит, прошу!"

languages.text: {n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if her throat were encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь дотронуться до камня в шее Кассии, однако неизвестная сила не позволяет вам даже коснуться его — пальцы застывают в миллиметре от кожи, словно невидимая броня покрывает теперь шею девушки. Камень начинает быстро нагреваться, обжигая нежную кожу девушки.{/n} "Хватит... Хватит, прошу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if the young woman's neck was encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, singing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "This is enough... Enough, I a m begging you!"

{n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if the young woman's neck was encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, singing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "This is enough... Enough, I a m begging you!"

The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"

The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"

{n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if her throat were encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"

languages.text: {n}你伸手去摸卡西娅脖子上的石头，但某种未知的力量阻止了你的动作。你的手指僵在了离她皮肤只有一根发丝的位置，就好像她的喉咙被看不见的盔甲包裹住一样。那块石头开始迅速变烫，灼烧着卡西娅娇嫩的皮肤。{/n}“住手……住手！求你了！”
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if her throat were encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}你伸手去摸卡西娅脖子上的石头，但某种未知的力量阻止了你的动作。你的手指僵在了离她皮肤只有一根发丝的位置，就好像她的喉咙被看不见的盔甲包裹住一样。那块石头开始迅速变烫，灼烧着卡西亚娇嫩的皮肤。{/n}“住手……住手！求你了！”

languages.text: {n}Estiras la mano hacia la piedra en el cuello de Cassia, pero un poder desconocido te impide llegar a tocarla: tus dedos se quedan inmóviles a un milímetro de ella, como si una armadura invisible cubriera su garganta. La piedra empieza a calentarse rápidamente, quemando la suave piel de Cassia.{/n} «Basta... ¡Basta! ¡Te lo ruego!».
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if her throat were encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Estiras la mano hacia la piedra en el cuello de Cassia, pero un poder desconocido te impide llegar a tocarla: tus dedos se quedan inmóviles a un milímetro de ella, como si una armadura invisible cubriera su garganta. La piedra empieza a calentarse rápidamente, quemando la suave piel de Cassia.{/n} «Basta... ¡Basta! ¡Te lo ruego!».

languages.text: {n}カシアの首にある石に手を伸ばすが、正体不明の力で触れることさえできない。あと一歩というところで指が動かなくなってしまう。まるでカシアの喉が見えない鎧に覆われているかのようだ。石は急速に熱を放ち始め、カシアの柔らかな皮膚を焼く。{/n}「やめて…もうやめてください！お願い！」
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if her throat were encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアの首にある石に手を伸ばすが、未知の力で触れることさえできない――肌まであとわずかというところで指が動かなくなってしまう。まるでカシアの喉が見えない鎧に覆われているかのようだ。石は急速に熱を放ち始め、カシアの柔らかな皮膚を焼く。{/n}「やめて…もうやめて！お願い！」
{n}カシアの首にある石に手を伸ばすが、正体不明の力で触れることさえできない。あと一歩というところで指が動かなくなってしまう。まるでカシアの喉が見えない鎧に覆われているかのようだ。石は急速に熱を放ち始め、カシアの柔らかな皮膚を焼く。{/n}「やめて…もうやめてください！お願い！」

languages.text: {n}Vous tendez la main vers la pierre incrustée dans le cou de Cassia, mais une force inconnue vous empêche de la toucher. Vos doigts s'immobilisent à un cheveu de sa peau, comme si sa gorge était entourée d'une armure invisible. La pierre se met à chauffer très vite, brûlant la peau délicate de la jeune femme.{/n} « Assez... Ça suffit ! Par pitié ! »
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if her throat were encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tendez la main vers la pierre incrustée dans le cou de Cassia, mais une force inconnue vous empêche de la toucher. Vos doigts s'immobilisent à un cheveu de sa peau, comme si sa gorge était entourée d'une armure invisible. La pierre se met à chauffer très vite, brûlant la peau délicate de la jeune femme.{/n} « Assez... Ça suffit ! Par pitié ! »

languages.text: {n}Du greifst nach dem Stein in Cassias Hals, aber eine unbekannte Kraft verhindert, dass du ihn auch nur berührst – deine Finger erstarren eine Haaresbreite von der Haut entfernt, als steckte ihre Kehle in einer unsichtbaren Rüstung. Der Stein erhitzt sich rasch und versengt Cassias zarte Haut.{/n} "Genug ... genug! Ich flehe Euch an!"
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if her throat were encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Du greifst nach dem Stein in Cassias Hals, aber eine unbekannte Kraft verhindert, dass du ihn auch nur berührst – deine Finger erstarren eine Haaresbreite von der Haut entfernt, als steckte ihre Kehle in einer unsichtbaren Rüstung. Der Stein erhitzt sich rasch und versengt Cassias zarte Haut.{/n} "Genug ... genug! Ich flehe Euch an!"

languages.original_text: {n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if her throat were encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın boynundaki taşa uzanıyorsun ama bilinmeyen bir güç, ona dokunmanı dahi engelliyor. Parmakların tam kadının tenine dokunacakken donakalıyor. Sanki boğazı, görünmez bir zırhla çevriliymiş gibi. Taş hızla ısınmaya başlıyor ve Cassia'nın narin tenini dağlıyor.{/n} "Yeter! Yeter! Yalvarırım!"
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for the stone in Cassia's neck, but an unknown power prevents you from even touching it — your fingers freeze a hair's breadth from the skin, as if her throat were encased in unseen armour. The stone starts heating up fast, searing Cassia's tender skin.{/n} "Enough... Enough! I beg you!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia'nın boynundaki taşa uzanıyorsun ama bilinmeyen bir güç, ona dokunmanı dahi engelliyor. Parmakların tam kadının tenine dokunacakken donakalıyor. Sanki boğazı, görünmez bir zırhla çevriliymiş gibi. Taş hızla ısınmaya başlıyor ve Cassia'nın narin tenini dağlıyor.{/n} "Yeter! Yeter! Yalvarırım!"
